short.ar: AdGuard Extra مصمم لأجل أن يحل الحالات المعقدة و اللتي لاتتمكن قواعد حجب الإعلانات العادية من حجبها أو تكون غير كافية.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: AdGuard Extra is designed to solve complicated cases when regular ad blocking rules aren't enough.
short.cs: AdGuard Extra má za úkol řešit složité případy, když běžná pravidla pro blokování reklam nestačí.
short.da: AdGuard Extra er designet til at løse komplicerede tilfælde, hvor alm. adblockingregler ikke er nok.
short.de: AdGuard Extra wurde entwickelt, um komplexe Fälle zu lösen, wenn normalen Regeln zum Sperren von Werbung nicht ausreichen.
short.el: Το AdGuard Extra είναι σχεδιασμένο να επιλύει περίπλοκες καταστάσεις όπου οι κοινοί κανόνες αποκλεισμού διαφημίσεων δεν αρκούν.
short.es: AdGuard Extra está diseñado para resolver casos complicados cuando las reglas regulares para bloqueo de anuncios no son suficientes.
short.fi: AdGuard Extra on suunniteltu ratkaisemaan monimutkaisia tapauksia silloin kun tavalliset mainosestosäännöt eivät riitä.
short.fr: AdGuard Extra est conçu pour résoudre les cas complexes lorsque les règles de blocage des publicités ne suffisent pas.
short.he: AdGuard Extra מתוכנן לפתור מקרים מורכבים בהם כללים רגילים של חסימת פרסומות אינם מספיקים.
short.hr: AdGuard Extra je dizajniran za rješavanje kompleksnih slučajeva kada opća pravila blokade oglasa nisu dovoljna.
short.hu: Az AdGuard Extra olyan bonyolultabb esetek megoldására szolgál, amikor a hagyományos hirdetésblokkolási szabályok nem elegendőek.
short.id: AdGuard Extra dirancang untuk menyelesaikan kasus rumit saat aturan pemblokiran iklan biasa tidak cukup.
short.it: AdGuard Extra è progettato per risolvere casi complicati in cui le normali regole di blocca-annunci non sono sufficienti.
short.ja: AdGuard Extraは、通常の広告ブロックルールが十分ではない複雑なケースを解決するために設計されています。
short.ko: AdGuard Extra는 일반적인 광고 차단 규칙이 충분하지 않은 복잡한 문제를 해결하도록 설계되었습니다.
short.lt: AdGuard Extra yra skirtas išspręsti sudėtingesnius atvejus, kai nepakanka įprastų skelbimų blokavimo taisyklių.
short.lv: AdGuard Extra ir paredzēts sarežģītu gadījumu risināšanai, kad nepietiek ar parastajiem reklāmu bloķēšanas noteikumiem.
short.ms: AdGuard Tambahan direka untuk menyelesaikan kes rumit apabila peraturan sekatan iklan biasa tidak mencukupi.
short.nl: AdGuard Extra is bedoeld om ingewikkelde gevallen op te lossen wanneer de standaard advertentie blokkeringsregels niet voldoende…
short.no: AdGuard Extra er utformet for å løse kompliserte saker der vanlige blokkeringsoppføringer ikke strekker til.
short.pl: AdGuard Extra jest przeznaczony do rozwiązywania skomplikowanych przypadków, gdy zwykłe reguły blokowania reklam nie wystarczą.
short.ro: AdGuard Extra este creeat să rezolve cazuri complexe când regulile uzuale de blocat reclame sunt insuficiente.
short.ru: AdGuard Extra предназначен для решения более сложных задач, когда обычных правил блокировки рекламы недостаточно.
short.sk: AdGuard Extra má za úlohu riešiť zložité prípady, keď bežné pravidlá blokovania reklám nestačia.
short.sl: AdGuard Extra naj bi rešil zapletene primere, ko običajna pravila za zaviranje oglasov niso dovolj.
short.sr: AdGuard Extra bi trebalo da reši komplikovane slučajeve u kojima standardna pravila blokiranja reklama nisu dovoljna.
short.th: AdGuard Extra ถูกออกแบบมาเพื่อแก้ไขกรณีที่ซับซ้อนเมื่อกฎการปิดกั้นโฆษณาปกติไม่เพียงพอ
short.tr: AdGuard Extra, normal reklam engelleme kurallarının yeterli olmadığı karmaşık durumları çözmek için tasarlanmıştır.
short.uk: AdGuard Extra призначений для вирішення складних завдань, коли звичайних правил для блокування реклами недостатньо.
short.vi: AdGuard Extra được thiết kế để giải quyết các vấn đề khi mà các quy tắc chặn quảng cáo thông thường chưa đủ.

long.ar,bg,cs,da,de,es,et,fa,fr,he,hr,hu,id,i:
AdGuard Extra is a browser extension that is supposed to fight ad blocking circumvention attempts which become more and more popular. Regular ad blocking rules do not allow us being as flexible as it's necessary, that's why AdGuard Extra was developed.

## Important

AdGuard Extra is a companion extension, it is supposed to be used with a full-scale ad blocker like AdGuard or any other. It provides no user interface save for the extension icon in the toolbar. Your browser should allow you to hide the icon if it annoys you.

Please note that it is only useful on a limited set of websites, and it does nothing on the websites not from this list.

Here's the list of websites where this extension can be useful:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/blob/master/README.md#important

If you have any issue to report, please do it here:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues
long.am,bn,ca,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
Please note, that this is a beta version of this extension: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/gkeojjjcdcopjkbelgbcpckplegclfeg

AdGuard Extra is a browser extension that is supposed to fight ad blocking circumvention attempts which become more and more popular. Regular ad blocking rules do not allow us being as flexible as it's necessary, that's why AdGuard Extra was developed.

## Important

AdGuard Extra is a companion extension, it is supposed to be used with a full-scale ad blocker like AdGuard or any other. It provides no user interface save for the extension icon in the toolbar. Your browser should allow you to hide the icon if it annoys you.

Please note that it is only useful on a limited set of websites, and it does nothing on the websites not from this list.

Here's the list of websites where this extension can be useful:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/blob/master/README.md#important

If you have any issue to report, please do it here:
